title: 2021 California gubernatorial recall election
added: *[[Gavin Newsom]], incumbent [[governor of California]] (2019–present)<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.cbsnews.com/news/gavin-newsom-recall-california-governor/|title=Recall threats are common in California.
